ingredients.item: 2 x 400g cans essential Waitrose cannellini beans
4 Waitrose frozen yellowﬁn tuna steaks, thawed
Filippo Berio extra virgin olive oil spray

instructions.step: Drain and rinse the beans and place in a large bowl. Halve the cherry tomatoes, slice the salad onions and chop the parsley; fold into the beans with the rocket.
Heat a non-stick griddle pan over a high heat, spritz the tuna with the olive oil spray and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side.
Spoon the bean salad on to 4 serving plates, top with the seared tuna and drizzle each with a teaspoon of balsamic vinegar.
